name: Basic Save Combo
author: Moosh
info: A basic combo script that opens a save menu when you press A under it.
description:
A basic combo script that opens a save menu when you press A under it. 

I wrote this because ZC's save combos are bad.
setup: Set CMB_SAVEPROMPT and CS_SAVEPROMPT to the combo and cset for the save prompt animation. Place the script on your save point combo. That's about it.
